attributes.action: Decree a four day work week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Four days of work is sufficient, given the amount of extra time the majority of people put in. It would be in everyone's interest to work 9-10 hours a day for four days and then have three days off. This would reduce hostility and absenteeism amongst employees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
